Title: The Catcher in the Rye
Description: A classic novel about teenage rebellion and identity.
Author: J.D. Salinger
Blurb: Holden Coalfield narrates his experiences in New York City.

Title: A Brief History of Time
Description: An exploration of cosmology and the nature of the universe.
Author: Stephen Hawking
Blurb: A deep dive into black holes, time travel, and the Big Bang.

Title: Gone Girl
Description: A psychological thriller about a missing wife.
Author: Gillian Flynn
Blurb: Nick Dunne becomes the prime suspect in his wife's disappearance.

Title: The Hobbit
Description: A fantasy adventure following Bilbo Baggins on a quest.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Blurb: Bilbo, a hobbit, embarks on an adventure to reclaim a lost treasure.

Title: Steve Jobs
Description: The biography of Apple's co-founder, Steve Jobs.
Author: Walter Isaacson
Blurb: A comprehensive look into Steve Jobs' life and career.
